Michael Adebayo Olayinka (amụrụ na 23 Septemba 1999), nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Ruger, bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu Afrobeat nke Naijiria. Ruger batara n'ìhè n'afọ 2021 mgbe ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ndekọ nke D'Prince "Jonzing world records" na nkwekọ mbipụta na nkesa na Columbia Records, na Sony Music Entertainment, ngalaba UK. Na 4 Machị 2021, ọ wepụtara EP mbụ ya Pandemic
"Bounce", ghọrọ nnukwu egwu sitere na Pandemic EP, wee malite na nọmba nke ịrị atọ na itoolu na chaatị Top 50
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ malitere na ọnụọgụ ịrị abụọ na chaatị TurnTable End of the Year

Na 19 Nọvemba 2021, ọ wepụtara EP nke abụọ ya, nke akpọrọ The Second Wave, ọ bụkwa "Dior" si na EP ahụ duziri ya, nke ruru ọnụọgụ ịrị atọ na abụọ na chaatị Top 50, na ọnụọgụ ịrị na ise na UK Afrobeats Singles Chart.
Michael malitere egwu mgbe ọ dị obere, ọ bụkwa onye otu egwu ụlọ akwụkwọ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma ma bụrụkwa onye otu ukwe chọọchị ya
Ọ malitere ide egwu ma rụọ ọrụ na ihe ngosi na mmemme ụlọ akwụkwọ

Mgbe D'Prince chọpụtara ya, D'Princes n'onwe ya kpọrọ ya "Ruger". N'ọnwa Jenụwarị 2021, D'Prince kwuputara mbinye aka nke Ruger na Jonzing World na Sony Music Entertainment UK, na mmekorita ya na Columbia Records.

D'Prince mere ka ọha na eze mara ya, mgbe a tọhapụrụ "One Shirt", ya na Rema. N'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2021, ọ wepụtara Ruger, otu aha ya bụ onwe ya na ọrụ EP mbụ ya, nke akpọrọ PANDEMIC

O nwetara nkwado dị ukwuu site na ntọhapụ nke egwuregwu mbụ ya na egwu ya bu "Bounce", nke ghọrọ nnukwu egwu ya, ma ruo n'ọkwa nke mbụ na Apple Music na Naịjirịa, na mba ndị ọzọ dị n'Afrịka. N'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Nọvemba 2021, ọ wepụtara abụọ egwu nke abụọ ya nke akpọrọ The Second Wave, nke Kukbeats mepụtara.
